(That's got to be the weakest, dumbest, most inept attempt at linking those 
series together that I have ever read.  You go from one theory to the next 
with no real basis.  You know what, the atom thing may work in SCIENCE, but 
not in a cartoon series.  G1 was first by more than a decade, it laid down 
the law.  It laid down fact.  'Nuff said.)
